author: cms-sw
body:
- Build root with Python3
- create  and add llvm/lib/python3.6/site-package in to PYTHON3PATH
- added a dummy tool `python2to3` to create a symlink python pointing to python3. This will force every `#!/use/bin/env python` to run `python3`
title: [Python3][Devel] build root with python3
